document.title: bareMinerals® READY® Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15

manufacturedProduct.name: bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Translucent
bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Tan
bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Light
bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Medium
bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Dark
bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Deep

text.paragraph: Do not use on damaged or broken skin
When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.
Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs

code.displayName: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION

text.paragraph: Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

list.item: apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure
use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating

Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including:
limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
wear long-sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses
children under 6 months: Ask a doctor

text.paragraph: silica, coco-caprylate, lauroyl lysine, boron nitride, caprylic/capric triglyceride, corallina officinalis extract, bambusa arundinacea stem powder, tocopherol, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, glycine soja (soybean) oil, cetyl phosphate, alaria esculenta extract, cananga odorata flower oil, camellia sinensis leaf extract, jojoba esters, vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil, ascorbyl palmitate, linalool, benzyl benzoate, benzyl salicylate, farnesol. may contain: mica, iron oxides.

list.item: protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun.

text.paragraph: Dist. by Bare Escentuals Beauty, Inc., SF, CA 94105 USA
